title: SEO AI Blog Writer for Shopify | Addlly
description: Addlly AI’s eCommerce AI SEO blog writer lets you connect directly to your product catalog, select products to market, and receive topic suggestions based on real-time trends, SEO-optimized blogs, and related social media posts. Our custom Gen AI tailors content to your location and language, complemented by an extensive image library. Install Addlly AI today and transform your eCommerce strategy!
